name: psp_cm
description: Cross-platform tool for psp filesystem manipulation

scripts.build: echo Building TypeScript project... && tsc && node copy-assets.js
scripts.start: npm run build && echo Starting Electron... && electron .
scripts.package-win: echo Packaging for Windows... && npm run build && npm run modclean && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.package-appimage: echo Packaging for AppImage... && npm run build && npm run modclean && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.purge: echo Cleaning up... && rimraf release dist node_modules

author: https://github.com/m-remis
